titleStmt.title: A vvell vvishing to a place of pleasure To an excellent new tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assignes of Thomas Symcocke,

notesStmt.note: Another edition of STC 25229.7, published ca. 1627.
Place of publication supplied by cataloger; STC estimates 1628-1629 as publication date.
Printed on verso: "An inconstant female. With a reward of her disdaine in equalitie. To the same tune."; though to the same tune, these are two separate ballads.
Woodcut illustrations at head of each ballad.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
